verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַגִּתִּ֬ית <S%H1665><s%> upon Gittith לְאָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> [A Psalm] of Asaph הַ֭רְנִינוּ <S%H7442><s%> Sing aloud לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> unto God עוּזֵּ֑נוּ <S%H5797><s%> our strength הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> make a joyful noise לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> unto the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

שְֽׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> Take זִ֭מְרָה <S%H2172><s%> a psalm וּתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> and bring תֹ֑ף <S%H8596><s%> hither the timbrel כִּנּ֖וֹר <S%H3658><s%> harp נָעִ֣ים <S%H5273><s%> the pleasant עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נָֽבֶל׃ <S%H5035><s%> with the psaltery

תִּקְע֣וּ <S%H8628><s%> Blow up בַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> in the new moon שׁוֹפָ֑ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet בַּ֝כֵּ֗סֶה <S%H3677><s%> in the time appointed לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day חַגֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H2282><s%> on our solemn feast

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> is a חֹ֣ק <S%H2706><s%> For this [was] a statute לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִ֝שְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> [and] a law לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

עֵ֤דוּת ׀ <S%H5715><s%> [for] a testimony בִּֽיה֘וֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3084><s%> in Joseph שָׂמ֗וֹ <S%H7760><s%> This he ordained בְּ֭צֵאתוֹ <S%H3318><s%> when he went out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> throughout אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt שְׂפַ֖ת <S%H8193><s%> a language לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> [that] I understood אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> [where] I heard

הֲסִיר֣וֹתִי <S%H5493><s%> I removed מִסֵּ֣בֶל <S%H5447><s%> from the burden שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <S%H7926><s%> his shoulder כַּ֝פָּ֗יו <S%H3709><s%> his hands מִדּ֥וּד <S%H1731><s%> from the pots תַּעֲבֹֽרְנָה׃ <S%H5674><s%> were delivered

בַּצָּרָ֥ה <S%H6869><s%> in trouble קָרָ֗אתָ <S%H7121><s%> Thou calledst וָאֲחַ֫לְּצֶ֥ךָּ <S%H2502><s%> and I delivered אֶ֭עֶנְךָ <S%H6030><s%> thee I answered בְּסֵ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> thee in the secret place רַ֑עַם <S%H7482><s%> of thunder אֶבְחָֽנְךָ֨ <S%H974><s%> I proved עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> thee at the waters מְרִיבָ֣ה <S%H4809><s%> of Meribah סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> O my people וְאָעִ֣ידָה <S%H5749><s%> and I will testify בָּ֑ךְ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> unto thee O Israel אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תִּֽשְׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> if thou wilt hearken לִֽי׃

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Let there be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְ֭ךָ אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> god זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> There shall no strange וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <S%H7812><s%> be in thee neither shalt thou worship לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> god נֵכָֽר׃ <S%H5236><s%> any strange

אָנֹכִ֨י ׀ <S%H595><s%> I יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הַֽ֭מַּעַלְךָ <S%H5927><s%> which brought מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הַרְחֶב־ <S%H7337><s%> wide פִּ֝֗יךָ <S%H6310><s%> open thy mouth וַאֲמַלְאֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4390><s%> and I will fill

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> would not hearken עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> But my people לְקוֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> to my voice וְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not אָ֥בָה <S%H14><s%> would לִֽי׃

וָֽ֭אֲשַׁלְּחֵהוּ <S%H7971><s%> So I gave them up בִּשְׁרִיר֣וּת <S%H8307><s%> lust לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> unto their own hearts' יֵ֝לְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> to walk בְּֽמוֹעֲצוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4156><s%> in their own counsels

ל֗וּ <S%H3863><s%> Oh עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> that my people שֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ <S%H8085><s%> had hearkened לִ֑י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> unto me [and] Israel בִּדְרָכַ֥י <S%H1870><s%> in my ways יְהַלֵּֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> had walked

כִּ֭מְעַט <S%H4592><s%> I should soon אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H341><s%> their enemies אַכְנִ֑יעַ <S%H3665><s%> have subdued וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> against צָ֝רֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6862><s%> against their adversaries אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> and turned יָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> my hand

מְשַׂנְאֵ֣י <S%H8130><s%> The haters יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְכַֽחֲשׁוּ־ <S%H3584><s%> should have submitted ל֑וֹ וִיהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> to Him עִתָּ֣ם <S%H6256><s%> themselves unto him but their time לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> should have endured for ever

וַֽ֭יַּאֲכִילֵהוּ <S%H398><s%> He should have fed מֵחֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> them also with the finest חִטָּ֑ה <S%H2406><s%> of the wheat וּ֝מִצּ֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> out of the rock דְּבַ֣שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and with honey אַשְׂבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7646><s%> should I have satisfied
